text: Laugh my friend, for laughter ignites a fire within the pit of your belly and awakens your being.
author: <Author:0x00007f4470069080>

text: Be fearless in the pursuit of what sets your soul on fire.
author: <Author:0x00007f4470065de0>

text: To be able to look back upon one's life in satisfaction, is to live twice.
author: <Author:0x00007f4470062820>

text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
author: <Author:0x00007f447009ee38>

text: Find out who you are and do it on purpose.
author: <Author:0x00007f447009b418>

text: To live a life fulfilled reflect on the things you have with gratitude.
author: <Author:0x00007f4470098038>

text: Our chief want is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be.
author: <Author:0x00007f4470094b18>

text: Promise yourself to be just as enthusiastic about the success of others as you are about your own.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700912d8>

text: Those who are lifting the world upward and onward are those who encourage more than criticize.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700ad668>

text: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700a8f28>

text: Mind. Body. Soul. These are the three things self-care is all about.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700a51e8>

text: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700a06e8>

text: There’s only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that’s your own self.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700dbcc0>

text: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700d78a0>

text: Talk to yourself like you would to someone you love.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700d08c0>

text: We must take care of our families wherever we find them.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700fc088>

text: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700f7ee8>

text: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
author: <Author:0x00007f44700f3e88>

text: All it takes is one good person to restore hope.
author: <Author:0x00007f447015f0c0>

text: In every conceivable manner, the family is a link to our past, bridge to our future.
author: <Author:0x00007f447015bce0>

text: Cooperation is the thorough conviction that nobody can get there unless everybody gets there.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701582c0>

text: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701548a0>

text: Talent wins games, but teamwork wins championships.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701514c0>

text: Problems can become opportunities when the right people come together.
author: <Author:0x00007f447018c958>

text: When there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
author: <Author:0x00007f4470188858>

text: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.
author: <Author:0x00007f4470184118>

text: Inspiration exists, but it has to find us working.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701af700>

text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701ab600>

text: Light tomorrow with today.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701a75a0>

text: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701a4260>

text: Waste no more time arguing what a good person should be. Be one.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701a07a0>

text: What we know matters but who we are matters more.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701dc958>

text: Be more concerned with your character than your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are.
author: <Author:0x00007f44701d8d58>
